item.title: 中东地区部分生产商停产，全球尿素价格飙升
item.description: 随着中东地区暴力活动的不断升级，全球主要化肥成分尿素的价格也随之飙升。【原文：Global prices of key fertilizer ingredient urea have surged alongside escalating violence in the Middle East, which threatens to choke supplies of the crop nutrient from a significant producing and exporting region.】

item.title: S&P 500 指数上扬，交易商评估伊朗罢工的影响
item.description: 美国周末袭击伊朗核场址后，周一美股走势低迷，交易商猜测事态升级仍将得到控制。【原文：US stock moves were subdued on Monday following a US attack on Iranian nuclear sites over the weekend as traders speculated the escalation would remain contained.】

item.title: 美国制造业扩张，通胀措施加速
item.description: 6 月份迄今为止，美国制造业稳步增长，部分反映出就业增长更为强劲，而两项通胀指标则加速上升至 2022 年 7 月以来的最高水平。【原文：US manufacturing grew at a steady pace so far in June, partly reflecting stronger employment growth, while two measures of inflation accelerated to the highest levels since July 2022.】

item.title: 纽约州计划新建核电站
item.description: 纽约计划建造一座核电站，这是美国 15 年多来首次新建大型核电站。【原文：New York plans to build a nuclear-power facility, the first major new plant undertaken in the US in more than 15 years.】

item.title: 得克萨斯州州长否决旨在打击四氢大麻酚的大麻法案
item.description: 得克萨斯州州长格雷格-阿博特（Greg Abbott）否决了一项禁止用大麻制造娱乐性四氢大麻酚产品的法案，从而留下了一个漏洞，使商店得以出售可产生类似大麻兴奋感的药片、大麻烟和饮料。【原文：Texas Governor Greg Abbott vetoed a bill that would have banned recreational THC products made from hemp, leaving open a loophole that has allowed shops to sell edibles, joints and drinks that create a high similar to marijuana.】

item.title: 华为新笔记本电脑进一步证明芯片研发停滞不前
item.description: 华为技术有限公司（Huawei Technologies Co.【原文：Huawei Technologies Co.’s latest computer product is powered by a chip manufactured using years-old technology, suggesting US sanctions are still preventing China from developing cutting-edge semiconductor technologies.】

item.title: 庞普利亚诺领导的比特币公司将通过科恩 SPAC 交易上市
item.description: Anthony Pompliano 的金融服务公司已同意通过与一家空头支票公司合并的方式上市，并计划在其资产负债表上记录价值多达 10 亿美元的比特币。【原文：Anthony Pompliano’s financial services firm has agreed to go public by merging with a blank-check company, and is planning to have as much as $1 billion worth of Bitcoin on its balance sheet.】

item.title: 拉加德重申欧洲央行有能力应对不确定性
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，欧洲中央银行完全有能力应对 "异常严重 "的经济和政治不确定性。【原文：The European Central Bank is well placed to tackle “exceptionally high” economic and political uncertainty, President Christine Lagarde said.】

item.title: Fiserv 将提供自己的稳定币，并与 PayPal 和 Circle 合作
item.description: Fiserv 公司正在推出自己的稳定币，并与传统和加密支付公司 PayPal Holdings Inc.【原文：Fiserv Inc. is lauching its own stablecoin and joining with both traditional and crypto payments firms PayPal Holdings Inc. and Circle Internet Group Inc. to develop products for financial institutions and merchants within the banking technology provider’s ecosystem.】

item.title: 中东霍尔木兹海峡石油运输在美军空袭后受阻
item.description: 在美国空袭伊朗之后，霍尔木兹海峡的石油运输仍在继续；尽管有风险加剧的警告和该地区一些不寻常的油轮移动。【原文：Oil shipments through the Strait of Hormuz are holding up in the wake of US airstrikes on Iran — despite warnings of heightened risk and some unusual tanker movements in the region.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚第二家银行在尚未开放的股票市场上市交易
item.description: 加达银行（Gadaa Bank）是一家国内商业贷款公司，它已成为埃塞俄比亚新兴股票市场上第二家上市但尚未开始交易的公司。【原文：Gadaa Bank, a domestically owned commercial lender, has become the second company to list on Ethiopia’s nascent stock market that’s yet to commence trading.】

item.title: 多诺霍警告：医药关税可能使爱尔兰失去 7.5 万个工作岗位
item.description: 爱尔兰财政部长帕夏尔-多诺霍（Paschal Donohoe）警告说，爱尔兰是辉瑞公司（Pfizer Inc.）和礼来公司（Eli Lilly & Co.【原文：Tariffs on pharmaceuticals could cost Ireland — a multinational hub for the likes of Pfizer Inc. and Eli Lilly & Co. — up to 75,000 jobs, Finance Minister Paschal Donohoe warned.】

item.title: 投资者争相将现金注入价值 7.4 万亿美元的美国货币市场基金行业
item.description: 随着美国货币市场基金的资产规模达到创纪录的 7.4 万亿美元，现金涌入美国货币市场基金的速度几乎没有放缓的迹象。【原文：The rush of cash into the US money-market funds is showing few signs of slowing as it secured a record $7.4 trillion in assets.】

item.title: 科威特开始动员银行出售 60 亿美元债券
item.description: 据科威特财政部官员称，科威特已开始向银行发出建议书，以从国际债务市场筹集约 60 亿美元。【原文：Kuwait has started the process of sending a request for proposal to banks to raise about $6 billion from international debt markets, according to Ministry of Finance officials.】

item.title: Agnico Eagle 首席执行官认为购买黄金股的理由只有一个
item.description: 世界上最有价值的金矿公司之一的负责人认为，购买金矿股票只有一个理由—；而该行业中为投资者提供这个理由的公司太少了。【原文：The head of one of the world’s most valuable gold miners believes there’s only one reason to buy a gold mining stock — and too few companies in the industry are offering it to investors.】

item.title: 年轻投资者对另类资产的需求正在重塑华尔街的游戏规则
item.description: 华尔街有了新宠投资者。他们年轻、富裕，对传统市场能否带来长期财富持怀疑态度。在金融危机的影响下，在科技乐观主义的推动下，千禧一代和 Z 世代这个富裕阶层正在将资金转移到另类资产的热闹世界中。【原文：Wall Street has a new favorite investor. They’re young, they’re affluent and they’re skeptical that traditional markets can deliver wealth over the long haul. Shaped by financial crises and fueled by tech optimism, this well-heeled class of Millennials and Gen Z are moving their money into the buzzy world of alternative assets.】

item.title: 对冲基金高管瞄准 1 亿美元积累 BNB 代币
item.description: 一个加密货币对冲基金高管团队正在进行高级谈判，以筹集 1 亿美元资金，通过他们控制的一家上市公司投资于与 Binance 控股有限公司相关联的代币，这是迈克尔-赛勒（Michael Saylor）的策略公司（Strategy）开创的比特币财政蓝图的最新发展。【原文：A team of crypto hedge fund executives are in advanced talks to raise $100 million for investing in a token linked to Binance Holdings Ltd. through a publicly listed company they control, in the latest spin on the Bitcoin treasury blueprint pioneered by Michael Saylor’s Strategy.】

item.title: 美国防备伊朗空袭后的 "低级 "网络攻击
item.description: 美国官员警告企业做好准备，应对美国空袭伊朗核场址后可能发生的伊朗网络攻击。【原文：US officials are warning businesses to brace for potential Iranian cyberattacks following American airstrikes on the country’s nuclear sites, an event that experts say could draw a relatively small response from hackers.】

item.title: LME 库存快速减少，铜面临历史性挤压
item.description: 随着库存迅速下降推高现货价格，伦敦金属交易所正在上演铜市场有史以来最大的挤压。【原文：One of the copper market’s biggest-ever squeezes is unfolding on the London Metal Exchange as rapidly declining inventories push up spot prices.】

item.title: 中东局势升级引发通胀风险，美元大涨
item.description: 由于美国对伊朗的打击刺激了对避险货币的需求，同时凸显了油价攀升带来的风险，美元升至近一个月来的最高水平。【原文：The dollar rose to the highest level in nearly a month as US strikes on Iran spurred demand for the haven currency while underscoring the risks posed by climbing oil prices.】

item.title: 伊朗石油危机标志着地缘政治风险溢价的落幕
item.description:
在短暂飙升之后，原油期货周一收窄涨幅，延续了整个冲突期间的冷淡趋势。【原文：

After a brief spike, crude futures pared gains Monday, continuing the trend of apathy seen throughout the conflict.

item.title: 债券交易员从美联储官员身上寻找降息时机的线索
item.description: 债券投资者正密切关注美联储官员在最近一次政策会议上预计的 2025 年两次降息的暗示。【原文：Bond investors are on alert for hints on when the Federal Reserve will deliver the two 2025 interest-rate cuts officials projected at their latest policy meeting.】

item.title: 以色列继续攻击伊朗，关于何时停止的争论不绝于耳
item.description: 在美国于周末对伊朗实施打击后，以色列战机继续对伊朗导弹系统、机场和福尔道核基地发动攻击，而伊朗国内则就这场攻击行动应持续多久展开了激烈辩论。【原文：Israeli warplanes kept up their attacks on Iranian missiles systems, airfields and the Fordow nuclear site following US strikes at the weekend, as debate raged in the country over how long the campaign should continue.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利为中间市场交易募集 32 亿美元资金
item.description: 摩根士丹利资本合伙公司（Morgan Stanley Capital Partners）专注于中型市场，在私募股权公司筹资市场艰难的情况下，为其最新的收购基金募集了 32 亿美元。【原文：Middle-market focused Morgan Stanley Capital Partners has collected $3.2 billion for its latest buyout fund amid a tough fundraising market for private equity firms.】

item.title: 安哥拉总统敦促美国公司投资石油和矿产以外的领域

item.title: 据称三家中国公司将参与苏伊士资产的下一轮竞标
item.description: 据知情人士透露，中国国有企业北京首都创业集团有限公司、中国建筑工程总公司和粤海控股有限公司是苏伊士集团中国水务基础设施资产的竞标者之一。【原文：Chinese state-owned firms Beijing Capital Group Co., China State Construction Engineering Corp. and Guangdong Holdings Ltd. are among bidders for Suez SA’s Chinese water infrastructure assets, according to people familiar with the situation.】
